events.name: Sunday Showcase: What's Your Story?
events.description:
What's Your Story?
Sunday- Tuesday, 5-7 June 
10pm - 7pm (last entry at 6pm)
Level 4
Free admission. Register in the Lobby.

What's your story?
A group of alumni from the School of Interactive and Digital Media (SIDM) shares the story of how digital media specialists: concept artists, game developers, interactive designers, and animators, work with ideas and build up to their final works in the creative industry. Presented through digital projection mapping, sensory processing installations and interactive games such as Monomino (featured in the image above), engage with creators of the works and find out what inspires their stories.
